TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CachedBitmap extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> does not cache bitmap data automatically. Using a CachedBitmap can improve performance in scenarios where multiple operations (such as clipping an image or scaling) need to be performed on a single bitmap.
## Examples The following code example shows how to create and use a CachedBitmap in code.
[!code-cs[CachedBitmap#4](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CachedBitmapExample/CachedBitmapExample.cs#4)] [!code-vb[CachedBitmap#4](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/CachedBitmapExample/CachedBitmapExample.vb#4)]

Docs.param: The source bitmap that is being cached.
Initialization options for the bitmap image.
Specifies how the bitmap is cached to memory.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of that has the specified source, bitmap create options, and bitmap cache option.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was .
